page.title: 03Newton Mill Touring Centre
page.content:
Newton Mill Touring Centre is a campsite for caravans and tents.There is a childrens play area,a licensed bar and restaurant,tourist information a launderette,toilets and showers.
The site covers 43 acres.There are 195 caravans.90 have 5 amp electricity supplies.There are normaly more tents than caravans.A trout stream runs along the site.Some of the children swim in it.The electricity bill for a year is Â£3308.In 1985 there will be 700 caravans staying.July and August are the two busiest months.The least busy month is January.
The site has been in 7 camping magazines.There might be a new swimming pool built.The campers like the cleanliness of the site. Camping there for 1 week costs Â£7.10.
